name: MAC Address to Manufacturer
description: MAC Address Lookup to find the hardware manufacturer and its postal address of a specific MAC Address

api_methods.name: maclookup
api_methods.description: Enter MAC Address (string) to find the manufacturer. MAC Formats Allowed: ('xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx', 'xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx', 'xxxx.xxxx.xxxx', 'xxxxxxxxxxxx')

parameters.name: mac_number
parameters.description: MAC Address Number to Find Manufacturer
